open.title: Vumatel Outage | Motherwell Zone 1
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Motherwell Zone 1, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Metrofibre| Edenvale

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha
open.description:
We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha, Western Cape.
Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work.
All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

updates.content: Vumatel in partnership with new contractors have began work with installations and maintenance in Khayelitsha again since the start of January, some sites are still inaccessible due to safety concerns, namely  Zones 8, 10, 11, 15, 16. Vumatel are working with the community to return to these areas as soon as is reasonable.

open.title: Vumatel| Bryanston East Sector 3
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Bryanston East Sector 3, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Metrofibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Metrofibre| Inyanga, Simba Road
open.description: Metrofibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Inyanga, Simba Road, Sunninghill, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Metrofibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Metrofibre is still working hard to bring back fibre services and the ETR is currently 01/03 at 5 pm. We would like to thank you for your patience and understanding.
